original_text: That night the Lord said to Gideon, ‘Get up now. Go down and attack the camp of the Midianites. I have put them under your power.
korean_text: 그 밤에 여호와께서 기드온에게 이르시되 일어나 진영으로 내려가라 내가 그것을 네 손에 넘겨 주었느니라

sentences.original_text: That night the Lord said to Gideon
Go down and attack the camp of the Midianites
I have put them under your power
